name: Homestead (itch) (ataboo)
description:
Make deliveries from your canoe as you tour a futuristic Solar Punk community.

This would be more of a prologue to a larger game.

Made for Godot Wild Jam #38.

Programming, Sound: ataboo
Production, Modelling: Heather Camp
Protagonist Voice: Jesse Harlton
Homestead Voice: Craig Ostrin (craigostrin.itch.io)

https://github.com/ataboo/homestead
